summary: REQ-10 and REQ-11 appear implemented: a release build script copies the generated AAB to a stable frontend/android-wrapper/out/app-release.aab path (creating the directory, printing the path), the stable output is gitignored, and documentation points to the stable location. However, the diff also includes many additional unrelated frontend/UI and PWA changes not requested by this BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Large set of unrelated frontend UI/page styling and routing changes (App/Layout/HomePage/OrderPage, Tailwind, CSS) not requested for “downloadable signed release AAB artifact”.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses only on Android AAB build artifact output + documentation; no UI/theme/page work requested, and constraints warn against unnecessary UI changes.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (entries for frontend/src/App.tsx, frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx, frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx, frontend/src/pages/OrderPage.tsx, frontend/index.css, frontend/tailwind.config.js, frontend/src/main.tsx)

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated PWA metadata and manifest/icon references (webmanifest + index.html) for Android wrapper discovery.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-10/REQ-11; BuildRequest explicitly targets stable AAB output and documentation only.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/updated Bubblewrap wrapper configuration and wrapper update tooling (bubblewrap.config.json, update-wrapper.sh) beyond the stable-output build artifact request.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goal says not changing TWA approach, but it does not ask to add wrapper generation scripts/config; only to adjust release build output location and docs.
Not requested by REQ-10/REQ-11 (docs and stable artifact output); this is additional setup scaffolding.
